summary: This function adds padding characters to the rear of a string, as needed.
formals: is the desired length of the string.
is the padding character to use.
returns: Return the result of repeatedly adding the pad character to the string until the string is the required length.
example-1: module Main in execution;%0A%0A@Start%0Adefun main (args : String[]) : void%0A{%0A    val string1 = F::padEnd(%22123%22, 0, 'X');%0A    val string2 = F::padEnd(%22123%22, 3, 'X');%0A    val string3 = F::padEnd(%22123%22, 5, 'X');%0A    val string4 = F::padEnd(%22123%22, 7, 'X');%0A%0A    F::println(string1);%0A    F::println(string2);%0A    F::println(string3);%0A    F::println(string4);%0A}
